name: cloudide-plus
description: CloudIDE+ is a powerful, browser-based integrated development environment (IDE) inspired by Visual Studio Code, built on modern cloud technologies.

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:gcp

author: CloudIDE+ Team
